pageContext.claim: “But the problem is, it's totally illegal what he did. I guess it's a felony. He's actually giving money to people -- he's paying people to vote.He's actually saying, here's money, now you go ahead and vote for only Democrats, right?”
pageContext.analysis: The Post reports, “Former New York mayor Mike Bloomberg and his team have raised more than $16 million to pay the court fines and fees of nearly 32,000 Black and Hispanic Florida voters with felony convictions, an effort aimed at boosting turnout for Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden.” Bloomberg’s donations make it possible for people to vote for the candidate of their choice — Biden, Trump or otherwise— in the coming election. That is not the same as paying them to vote or paying for a Biden vote.
